title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. VII, subch. A, Surrogate's Forms, form AA-2 - Citation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. VII, subch. A, Surrogate's Forms, form AA-2 - Citation

State Regulations
ANCILLARY ADMINISTRATION CITATION File No. ________
SURROGATE'S COURT - COUNTY
CITATION
THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW
YORK, By the Grace of God Free and

Independent
TO
A petition having been duly filed by
____________, who is domiciled at ____________
YOU ARE HEREBY CITED TO SHOW CAUSE before
the Surrogate's Court, ________ County, at ________, New York, on ________, at
o'clock in the noon of that day, why a decree should not be made in the estate
of ____________
lately domiciled at ____________
granting ancillary administration and
directing that
[ ] Ancillary Letters of Administration
issue to: ____________
[ ] Ancillary Letters of Administration
d.b.n. issue to: ____________
(State any further relief
requested)
HON. Dated, Attested and Sealed, Surrogate
________ ________
(Seal) Chief Clerk
____________
Attorney for Petitioner Telephone

Number
____________
Address of Attorney
[Note: This citation is served upon you as
required by law. You are not required to appear. If you fail to appear it will
be assumed you do not object to the relief requested. You have a right to have
an attorney appear for you.]
AA-2 (12/97)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. VII, subch. A, Surrogate's Forms, form
AA-2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
